Class StateManager

java.lang.Object
StateManager
public class StateManager extends Object
StateManager manages the time and start the game

The Title state is run in the constructor after starting the time. The end time is then checked when exiting the game.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    StateManager()
    Constructor that initializes the statestack, sets the time and starts the game
